_sText:
Arpley Rail Bridge :: Created by nay0r

http://www.map-central.co.uk

Here I bring you fy_arpley which started out roughly 4/5 months ago, it is based of a real location as i
like to build from real places, although parts of the map like the sewers are made up from other sources and my own 
ideas, The map has come along way with countless compiles changing and fixing various parts of the map 

The map contains a few custom textures and also a few upgraded textures which i have made bump map textures for and ive also tweaked a few to enhance the look of the map. 

The soundscape is custom and is based around the official source maps, However the nav is just a basic auto generated 
one, this is because i thought it was good enough and didnt really need to the hassle of tweaking it.

Finally the map has HDR and LDR compiled and a fully working radar image including an underground layout on top.

The main part of the map is acutally quite small to fit the fy theme but i decided to build a few routes linking underground to suite rushers and to try and prevent a fest of snipering, so you really do need to be wise if your going to sniper and 
watch your backs.

Theres also one hidden scout contained in the map which I wont give the location away.
